byline.contributor: Gardiner Harris reported from Honolulu, and Nicholas Fandos from Washington.
byline.original: By GARDINER HARRIS and NICHOLAS FANDOS

abstract: White House announces plans for town-hall-style meeting, at which Pres Obama and Atty Gen Loretta E Lynch will discuss gun violence in America, nation's need for increased gun control, and administration's stepped-up counterterrorism efforts; hour-long event, which will take place at George Mason University in Washington, DC, will be broadcast on CNN.
lead_paragraph: The hourlong event will be televised on CNN, and will come days after President Obama meets with the attorney general to discuss gun control.

headline.main: Obama to Hold Town Hall Meeting on Gun Violence
headline.print_headline: Obama Plans a TV Forum to Address Gun Violence

snippet: The hourlong event will be televised on CNN, and will come days after President Obama meets with the attorney general to discuss gun control.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
